title: v2 Increase demand or liquidity on Mutant
body:
Right now more mutants are created everyday, while the Y-men decrease.
This causes imbalance in the y-men / mutant pool.
this will eventually cause the project to fail, since the availability to exchange between the offered liquidity pairs is essential.
now to exchange about 20000 mutants to Y-Men will cause the price impact  to be effected by 25%. 10000 mutants will cause the price impact to be affected by 15%. 
If liquidity is being pulled by the imbalance of the decreasing and low supply of Y-Men, I am suggesting the following fixes. 

answer A:  Liquidity providing bot after sales. 
Have a bot automatically send Y-man or mutant to the pool when liquidity is going too low. 

answer B: NFT Mutants.
 Create new ways to spend Mutants or different routes. 1 suggestion would be to burn 10000 (medium rare) or 100000 (rare) mutants to buy NFT. 

answer C: New Mutant Demand. 
Create demand for Mutant in different ways just then to buy Y-men if liquidity issue can not be solved. A second liquidity pool is a possible solution, but more proposals need to be created if this is the winner. 

answer D: No Change.
waiting for better solutions
author: 0x1Fa4823613Fb2424cbDab225FC1eEfe3Bd293c84
